short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Version to connect to a server deployed on the client's own infrastructure

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple and effective extension to your account that allows to make connections without having to log in to your personal account on Getscreen.me server.

Only for connecting to the Self-Hosted version of the Getscreen.me servers
